text.text: Imagineering Institute, Iskandar, Malaysia. Researcher Contact Details: Olivia Petit (Email: oliviapetit@imagineeringinstitute.org) Trust online Dear participant, Welcome to our study! We are the Imagineering Institute, based in Iskandar, Malaysia. We are interested in understanding how people search product pictures with different taste names. If you decide to take part in this experiment, you will first read a target taste word, followed by a display containing 4 products, and your task will be to press, as rapidly as possible, one key when the target taste label product is present and another key when it is absent. We hope you enjoy it. Your participation is very important to us. You are being invited to participate because you are a member of the Prolific Academic online participant panel. The study will take around 15 minutes to complete. You would still be free to withdraw from the study at any time during the questionnaire, without needing to give a reason, and without penalty. The data will be fully anonymized, and stored on a secure computer at the Imagineering Institute.

TRIAL.text: <.text>Before we begin, please read below. By clicking I CONSENT you indicate you have consented to take part. If you decide to take part in this experiment, you will be asked to read some different taste words, one at a time, followed by a display containing 4 packages, and you will be asked to indicate, as soon as possible, whether or not a package with the target taste word is present. At the end of the study we will tell you more about the purpose of the study and why we are doing this research. You can also contact Olivia Petit (oliviapetit@imagineeringinstitute.org) for further information at a later date if you wish. If you have a concern about any aspect of this project, please contact Professor Adrian Cheok (Director of Imagineering Institute, Email: adrian@imagineeringinstitute.org, or May Quah, Email: May.Quah@khazanah.com.my. They will seek to resolve the matter in a reasonably expeditious manner. Please read the below consent statement and indicate whether you consent. Statement of informed consent 1. I have read and understand the information above and understand the general purpose of this experiment. 2. I understand that I can withdraw from the questionnaire at any time, for any reason, and without penalty, and that doing so will destroy my data. (NB – Please be aware that data collected is anonymous – if you change your mind after completing the experiment, we will be unable to trace your specific data to remove it). 3. I understand how to raise a concern or make a complaint (detailed above). 4. I understand that my responses are anonymous. 5. I agree to take part in this online experiment. </.text>

text.text: What is your Prolific Academic ID?
What country do you come from?

On each trial you will first read a target taste word. After seeing the taste word, a ﬁxation cross will be presented on the screen. Please remain fixated on the fixation cross, as long as the fixation cross is present. Then, you will see a display containing 4 packages. A word will be written on the front on each package. Your task will be to press, as rapidly as possible, one key when the target taste word is present and another key when it is absent. You will have 10 practice trials. The main experience will contain 160 trials.
We have finished the practice trials. Click 'begin' to start the study.

TRIAL.text: <.text>Trust online Thank-you for completing our study! The aim of this research was to investigate how spatial location would facilitate visual search for product packaging that was associated with a specific taste label. Previous research has demonstrated the existence of a number of crossmodal correspondences between taste/flavour and visual attributes. Here, we want to assess the correspondence between a taste and spatial elevation (up and down) and/or laterality (left and right). If you have any further questions, please contact Olivia Petit (Email: oliviapetit@imagineeringinstitute.org). PLEASE REMEMBER TO VISIT THE BELOW LINK SO PROLFIC ACADEMIC KNOWS YOU HAVE COMPLETED THE STUDY. THANKS. </.text>
